snippet: The financially troubled Museum of Contemporary Art in Los Angeles and the expansion-oriented University of Sothern California are discussing a potential partnership, the Los Angeles Times reported.
abstract: The financially troubled Museum of Contemporary Art in Los Angeles and the expansion-oriented University of Sothern California are discussing a potential partnership, the Los Angeles Times reported.
